title: Tech use by women in India up 5-fold in last decade: Now, 2 in 3 households have women using smartphones - Times of India
content: Tech use by women in India up 5-fold in last decade: Now, 2 in 3 households have women using smartphones  Times of India
description: India Business News: Of the women surveyed, the majority 53% said they use a smartphone to shop, 38% said for booking tickets or services, 47% said for making or accepting
